Question 4 aims to help staff evaluate different approaches to course design in light of University strategicpriorities and the wider purposes of highereducation.
emerging issues in academic practise: Question 1 aims to help staff propose and undertake an independent and self-driven learning and teaching project on a topic of your choosing.

Question 4 aims to help staff share the findings from the learning project in a format appropriate to the learning environment and context.
